attributes.action: Stop schools excluding pupils who have shaven heads.
attributes.additional_details:
It saddens me each time I read on social media that yet another school has excluded or chastised a pupil after shaving their head to raise money for a cancer charity.

Its time to intervene and change attitudes towards individuality, compassion and doing something good.

We the public ask the Dept for education to issue updated national guidance to sort this issue.
